text: Tumhari aurton mein say jo aurten hez say na umeed ho gaee hon agar tumhen shuba ho to unn ki muddat teen maheeney hai aur unn ki bhi jinhen hez aana shuroo hi na hua ho aur hamila aurton ki iddat unn kay waza-e-hamal hai aur jo shaks Allah Taalaa say daray ga Allah uss kay (her) kaam mein aasani ker dey ga
